name: Sweet Dreams (Lucidity)
description:
Note: We have tried our best to unify the PC

 and the WebGL build, but there are still differences between them. 

Those differences are listed below:

  • Music might start later or sooner than expected due to how itch.io and Unity handle loading large music files
  • Music might overlap other music sometimes

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Right Click - Shoot Stun Attack

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint
